item.description:
Xen'drik Expeditions returns to Pandemonium Books & Games in a frantic pair of super-weekends!

Noon to 5 PM at the Dining Room table of Doooom - Well of Woe, Round 3 - Hosted by Andrew French

At last, the Well of Woe! But is there any way that four different factions can put aside their differences and work together> (All factions welcome.)

-

Noon to 5 PM in the Arena - Covenant of Light Adventure 3: The Good Die Young - Hosted by Bill Lynch

The power of the Caldyn Fragments must be turned to the powers of good, and it's the Covenant's job to make sure that's just what happens. But, as they say, only the good die young... (Covenant of Light characters only.)



We can take 6 players per session, plus we take 2 alternates, who get the space if a player canceles or doesn't show. Please sign up by sending email to rpga [AT] bloopwatch [DOT] org

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: XenEx Panic Weekend @ Pandemonium Books & Games
